attributes.action: NOT to introduce a minimum price on alchol purchases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By doing so, punishes the hard working, average sociable drinker who enjoys a pint of beer or glass of wine at the end of a hard day.

It is completley ridiculous of the goverment to penalise society like this espicially in the current economic state.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
